tossup_question: -   –  Which of the following types of epithelial tissue would most likely be found lining the lungs and blood vessels?
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) Stratified columnar
X) Simple squamous
Y) Simple cuboidal
Z) Simple columnar
bonus_question: -   –  Which of the following could occur due to a mutation in a Hox gene in a human embryo?
bonus_MCQoptions:
W) Polydactyly [poly-dak-til-ee]
X) Sickle cell anemia
Y) Phenylketonuria [fee-nil-kee-toe-noo-ree-uh]
Z) Chronic myelogenous [my-uhl-aw-jen-us] leukemia
